Description:
In the corner of the large corridor you find a very ancient mural.

The mural is full of very old glyphs and most of them are unrecognizable to you. Even so, your general impression is that the mural talks about the origins of the pyramid.

Upon closer inspection, you realize that several of the glyphs can be moved and rotated. You have the feeling that some of them are misplaced.
DescriptionAction: Do you want to try to reposition the glyphs?

    "SSRewardText": "Laia tells you that when she was little, Basthet warned her not to touch the mural.     "SSRewardHealthPercent": 0.0,
    "SSRewardText": "(Navalea) \"One day, this pyramid appeared out of nowhere on the sands of Ulminin. A small expedition of architects of which I was a part were in charge of coming to investigate it.\n\nAfter several months of trying to enter without success. Basthet chose me and let me in. Over time, she gave me to understand that she was not from this world and that the pyramid was what she used to move between worlds.\n\nShe never told me anything more about why she came and stayed. Maybe with more time... if she hadn't cursed me and locked me up... maybe she would have told me more.\"\n\nAfter telling you the story, Navalea places the glyphs in their correct position, and a holy light descends from the ceiling and envelops her.",
